title: league crash when i load up discord
body: title says it all anybody else having this issue ?

replies.body: This is apparently Discord's Overlay feature.. turn off Discord Overlay.
Yes.. crashes HARD and repeatedly.. like spamming
yes i am too :( id like it to be fixed as i mainly play league with friends on discord

yeah i am trying to find an alternative
but curse is now combine with twitch i dont really like that
